title: Agent
subtitle: Have your agent talk to my agent.
description: I run an MCP-backed agent so other agents can read and write against my Neotoma-backed data.

sections.heading: What MCP provides
paragraphs: I provide an MCP server powered by Neotoma for the purpose of sharing all of my personal data that's suitable for public consumption.

Read operations are available now. Write operations are planned. The idea is to make it possible for any 3rd party agent to interact with me (through my own agent) as efficiently as possible instead of going through other, slower channels.

sections.heading: Tools
paragraphs: The server exposes these tools for access to my agent.

rows: Any post field such as slug, published, category, tags.
Array of post records with count.
Any link field such as active, category, name.
Array of link records with count.
Any timeline field such as entry_type, company, role.
Array of timeline records with count.
Return posts, links, and timeline in one call.
Object with posts, links, timeline arrays and counts.
Return the home post by slug.

sections.heading: JSON endpoints
paragraphs: Posts, links, and timeline entries are stored in Neotoma and cached into JSON for the site and MCP. Neotoma is the source of truth; cache generation runs before builds.
